Articles.Content:
Mike your work is unbelievable... Didn't you considered to add a "Donate" button on your threads?

I do it for love not money.

But donations in the way of help with the mod is appreciated

- - - Updated - - -

747 from Project ALCOPOR name change to KC-747 (more realistic)

Love it

- - - Updated - - -

I will get the 3 new modules added to download when I can

I do it for love not money.

But donations in the way of help with the mod is appreciated

- - - Updated - - -

Love it

I posted an updated to do list dont forget to copy it to first message

I have an name for the spaceplane which will be ORCRV

(Orbital Research and Crew Return Vehicle)

Let me know if u like that
mike is it possible to make a tower like one for sls and be able to attatch to the crawler?
That is in the plans to make a Gantry part to act like a launch clamp...similar in nature to the FASA launch towers

I do it for love not money.

But donations in the way of help with the mod is appreciated

I understand and appreciate, but I'd like to pay a beer or a coffee to you. For help, I'll try but my skills are terribly limited.

Ok, that crawler and the B-52 made me squee like a school girl XD

Anyway, question, will all these add-ons be available as separate downloads or will they all come in the main shuttle pack or both? Mainly because there are some things I really really want (like the B-52, god that thing looks gorgeous <3 ) and others I dont really want.

Just curious is all really. Keep up the fan-fricking-tastic work.

I will have payloads as one download and aircraft seperate

- - - Updated - - -

That is in the plans to make a Gantry part to act like a launch clamp...similar in nature to the FASA launch towers

What's the priority rating on this? 1 being first and 10 being leave it to last

- - - Updated - - -

I understand and appreciate, but I'd like to pay a beer or a coffee to you. For help, I'll try but my skills are terribly limited.

Thanks. Just enjoy the mods and offer whatever suggestions or help you can
Currently, it's sitting at around 5-6

Currently, it's sitting at around 5-6

Ok cool. Of all the things you can think of, what are numbers 1 and 2

Vote now people!

how about making the bell X-1?? could that be a thing?

Hey mike mind If I do some testing in these as well, considering it's kinda part of the main SSP?

- - - Updated - - -

Oh and Triston, looking forwards to seeing the x-37c!

Mee too! Hope you can make something from the stuff I gave you.

Also yes anything I post anywhere or on my github pages you can test.

Odviously unfinished stuff is unfinished and I know about it.
Okay, I'll take a look

Seems we are all keen on some payloads!

If possible I want to make a variety of different functioning modules/sats/specialties.

But happy to put anything into ksp

Ok I will make a new release for download called payloads and update every so often.

Keep the requests coming and I will keep you busy launching these things

MIR docking module???

- - - Updated - - -

Or tracking and data relay satellites?? With remote tech support

MIR docking module??? https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4a/Docking_Module_%28STS-74%29.jpg/480px-Docking_Module_%28STS-74%29.jpg

- - - Updated - - -

Or tracking and data relay satellites?? With remote tech support

I'm fairly sure the ISS mod pack that Mike was working on before has the Mir Docking Module included with it. The Tracking and Data Relay Satellites can be found in the US Probes Pack, though its not made for the Shuttle and getting it out of the cargo-bay is basically impossible without breaking the satellite.

I'm fairly sure the ISS mod pack that Mike was working on before has the Mir Docking Module included with it. The Tracking and Data Relay Satellites can be found in the US Probes Pack, though its not made for the Shuttle and getting it out of the cargo-bay is basically impossible without breaking the satellite.

OK. Oooo THE LUNAR ROVER?!?! Maybe?

OK. Oooo THE LUNAR ROVER?!?! Maybe?

Now that's something I haven't found and was disappointed that FASA didn't provide. Lunar Rover would be awesome.
Mike you have been summoned....... To make the lunar lander!!! Can it fold up as well??

Mike you have been summoned....... To make the lunar lander!!! Can it fold up as well??

Already made. Check FASA or similar packs
